text: yaj~jamuqKEnaq saMmi#tAqmA pra#tiqShThAyai# Kanatiq yaja#mAnamEqva pra#tiqShThAM ga#mayati dakShiNaqtO var.ShI#yasIM karOti dEvaqyaja#nasyaiqva rUqpama#kaqH purI#ShavatIM karOti praqjAvai paqSavaqH purI#ShaM praqjayaiqvaina#M paqSuBiqH purI#ShavantaM karOqtyutta#raM parigrAqhaM pari# gRuhNAtyEqtAva#tIq vai pRu#thiqvI yAva#tIq vEdiqstasyA# EqtAva#ta Eqva BrAtRu#vyaM niqrBajyAq&&tmanaq utta#raM parigrAqhaM pari#gRuhNAti krUqrami#vaq vA - [  ]  22
